article_metadata.news-keywords: Kimberly McCoy, Medicare, status, health care, emergency room, hidden tax
article_metadata.description: A recent story in The Bee says Medicare and Medi-Cal are now 50 years old. While we applaud these programs, let’s not forget that thousands of people do not have access to coverage because of their documentation status.
article_metadata.title: We all pay price for poor health care | Fresno Bee
